summary: What sort of fucking married shit is this? Going to the hospital together? Probably having each other as their emergency...

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: i can't stand all this "omg dan's only making jokes to cope with how panicked he was about his boyfriend fainting!!!" come on....
question: i can't stand all this "omg dan's only making jokes to cope with how panicked he was about his boyfriend fainting!!!" come on. yeah, dan probably panicked a little. but here's the thing. seeing someone faint is a relatively panic-inducing thing, especially if it's someone you care about. i'd have just as panicked a reaction to seeing my best friend faint as i would seeing my boyfriend faint. dan's reaction to the situation doesn't prove anything about their relationship.
answer:
Shit like this just goes to prove how selfish everyone in the fandom is. Right now I should be seeing nothing but well wishes and support for Phil and Dan both. And what am I seeing instead?

“Dan went with him to the hospital, what a good boyfriend phan confirmed”

“Phil can’t do any strenuous exercise the next few days, guess Dan has to top”

“OMG I bet Dan cried his eyes out”

“Is Phil dying?!?!”

“This is gonna inspire so many fanfics”

“Mpreg”

“Dan’s gay look how he’s laying”

Like some of you genuinely sicken me sometimes. I know that Phil’s fine and this isn’t a serious situation and people use humour to cope, but this fandom takes everything way too far, immediately.

reblog.comment:
Shit like this just goes to prove how selfish everyone in the fandom is. Right now I should be seeing nothing but well wishes and support for Phil and Dan both. And what am I seeing instead?

“OMG I bet Dan cried his eyes out”

“Is Phil dying?!?!”

“This is gonna inspire so many fanfics”

“Mpreg”

“Dan’s gay look how he’s laying”

Like some of you genuinely sicken me sometimes. I know that Phil’s fine and this isn’t a serious situation and people use humour to cope, but this fandom takes everything way too far, immediately.

trail.content_raw:
Shit like this just goes to prove how selfish everyone in the fandom is. Right now I should be seeing nothing but well wishes and support for Phil and Dan both. And what am I seeing instead?

Like some of you genuinely sicken me sometimes. I know that Phil’s fine and this isn’t a serious situation and people use humour to cope, but this fandom takes everything way too far, immediately.

Shit like this just goes to prove how selfish everyone in the fandom is. Right now I should be seeing nothing but well wishes and support for Phil and Dan both. And what am I seeing instead?
